description: File format based in ASF (Advanced Systems Format) that wraps an audio bitstream. Can contain bitstreams encoded by Windows Media Audio 7, 8, and 9 codecs.
extras: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><metadata><field name="disclosure">Is open format.</field><field name="filenameExtension">wma</field><field name="internetMediaType"></field><field name="pronomPUID"></field></metadata>
name: WMA (Windows Media Audio) File Format
